lagrange.impl.readers

Class Shapefile

  • java.lang.Object
    • lagrange.impl.readers.Shapefile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Habitat

    public class Shapefile
extends java.lang.Object
implements Habitat
    Provides basic capability for reading Shapefiles given a path location. A STRtree is built for the data upon construction.
    Author:
    Johnathan Kool
